text: Eadward cyningc gret Hereman bisceop & Harold eorl & Godric & ealle his þegenas on Bearrucscyre freondlic.

& ic cyðe eow þæt Ordric abbud & eal þæt hired on Abbendunes mynstre be minre unne & gife frigelice habban & wealdan Hornemeres hundred on hyre agenre andwealde on ecere worulde & swa þæt nan scyrgerefe oððe motgerefe þar habban æni socne oððe gemot buton þes abbudes agen hæse & unne.
